item.title: Guidance for handling CVE-2025-30065 using Microsoft Security capabilities
item.description:
Short Description: A newly disclosed critical vulnerability (CVE-2025-30065) in Apache Parquet, a popular open-source file format used for big data processing, could allow remote code execution (RCE) if a system imports a specially crafted malicious Parquet file. This flaw, rated with the highest CVSS severity score of 10.0, affects the parquet-java library (formerly parquet-mr).
Impact: While this vulnerability sounds alarming, the likelihood of real-world exploitation is considered low. Exploitation requires a rare scenario: an application or developer must process a malicious Parqu...
